snippet: Illinois could ban assault weapons under a plan proposed on Tuesday by Gov. Pat Quinn, but any gun regulation faces major hurdles even with a renewed debate after the theater shooting in Colorado last month.
abstract: Illinois could ban assault weapons under plan proposed by Gov Pat Quinn, but any gun regulation faces major hurdles even with a renewed debate after the theater shooting in Colorado.
lead_paragraph: Illinois could ban assault weapons under a plan proposed on Tuesday by Gov. Pat Quinn, but any gun regulation faces major hurdles even with a renewed debate after the theater shooting in Colorado last month.

headline.main: Illinois: Governor Wants Ban On Assault Weapons
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Governor Wants Ban On Assault Weapons
